Html:
We are using the IEEE add-on Style in our group and are considering whether to investigate having our IT group distribute the Style across the organization.

Is there a way to be auto-notified whenever particular Styles are updated?

Updated where?

Within your organization you could push them like you do with Windows updates.

On this site there is a RSS and mail notification system but you can't specify this for a single style.

When a specific Style is updated, I wanted to know if notifications go out to subscribers so that we can then push the updates out within our organization.

It sounds like there isn't a way to subscribe to get updates about a particular style, but there is a way to subscribe to get notifications of updates to all styles.

Thanks for the information.
